item.title: Choosing a programming language
item.description: An exploration into where to invest my time. No programming language is perfect, but learning to get the most out of one can take years, which is a long enough timespan that serious thought has to be put into which one to choose. Additionally, if the perfect programming language came along, it probably probably wouldn’t be the best choice for getting something done, because you wouldn’t be able to use the awesome collection of open source libraries that already exist in sub optimal languages.
